Posts.Content: My mom was diagnosed with level four breast cancer that spread to her bones and liver and adrenal glands. She was diagnosed last May and I was 21 at the time and her doctor told me to start getting mamograms at around 30. Since she is my mom I am more apt. to get it so that's when they told me to start getting checked. I hope that helps.
Posts.Title: Aunt Just Diagnosed With Breast Cancer
